name: Anuka Central Park
description: A 200-acre urban park featuring walking trails, botanical gardens, and outdoor concert venues.
alt: Anuka Central Park with walking trails and green spaces

name: Anuka History Museum
description: Explore the rich cultural heritage of our region through interactive exhibits and historical artifacts.

name: Riverfront District
description: The revitalized riverfront area features restaurants, shops, and entertainment venues along the scenic Anuka River.
alt: Anuka Riverfront with shops and restaurants

name: Technology Innovation Center
description: Home to dozens of startups and tech companies, driving innovation in our region.

name: Anuka Farmers Market
description: Open year-round with local produce, artisan goods, and community events every Saturday.

name: Anuka Art Gallery
description: Showcasing contemporary and traditional artworks from local and international artists.

name: Anuka Convention Center
description: State-of-the-art facility hosting conferences, trade shows, and corporate events.

name: Anuka Botanical Gardens
description: Beautifully landscaped gardens featuring native plants and seasonal flower displays.
